name: Oreo Ice Cream
author: Kristie Slinkard

ingredients.name: (14 oz.) can Eagle Brand condensed milk
c. (1 pint) whipped cream, not topping

instructions: In a large bowl, beat egg yolks. Stir in milk and vanilla. Fold cookies and whipped cream. Line a 2 quart container with aluminum foil and pour the mixture in it. Freeze for about six hours or until frozen. Remove from foil and cut.
